name: Kill-A-Ball
description:
• Control: Move the marble around using the key W, S, A and D. shoot the marble by clicking the mouse.
  • The goal of this game is to throw all 5 of opponent`s marble out of the stage.
  • Each player will have 5 marbles each, placed coordinately on the stage.
  • For each of opponent`s marble that you throw out of the stage, you will get 1 point and the winning condition is by clearing all of your opponent`s marbles on the stage.

Credits to:

  • Aiman Anwar
  • Fatin Aqidah
  • Mohammad Zulhisham
